text: 14.23: Ta 1.15Guma, ana siga then mbɨv, ana ndɨkndɨga phunin muuŋv, ana mba sɨgar mbɨrga, ana ne nzuav, Fhe Bakɨme nɨman simtɨk ki. Ne khaŋ muuŋgi, ana ndɨkndɨga phuni ki. Ana kha ndɨkndɨga mbui, “Gu kha siga pi ne nzerara, o fhu?” Fhe Bakɨme ne suaŋv na suanga thi? Nza vhɨra, nza maaŋ muuŋgip bigɨn thueŋ muuŋv, nza Zisas khothɨgi ndɨkndɨk khaŋ nza suanga, “Nza kha mbui tɨv, ne nzerigi fhuvara,” Nza maam, nza tɨva mbatɨgeŋ mbui.
